item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Projects - Ask Biden! - An All-American chatbot powered by OpenAI and ElevenLabs – Github pickupmusic - Next.js / TypeScript / Tailwind demo exploring gamification in music ed – Github tubescreamer - Experimenting with the Web Audio API and CSS illustration – Github joelaul.dev - Award-winning, GMO-free portfolio site bootstrapped with Hugo – Github Donate - I’m not a full-time goth e-girl yet, but your support can get me there faster.
